taskTimeCalculator.welcome: Welcome to the Task Time Calculator
taskTimeCalculator.explanation: Input the tasks for each moped and the travel times to calculate the total time needed. The team consists of Swappers, Fixers, and Mechanics. A Swapper replaces batteries (1 minute), a Fixer performs small repairs (5 minutes), and a Mechanic performs major repairs (8 minutes).
taskTimeCalculator.mopedsLabel: Mopeds (tasks separated by commas, e.g., S, F, SF, M)
